story: John jumped on the table because a spider was on the floor by him.
John knocked everything off the table.
John grabbed a pen while standing on the desk.
John picked up scissors from the desk too.
John wrote in the notebook that he was scared of the spider.
John saw a book on the floor.
John went to the book.
John grabbed the book.
John dropped the book into a pot of boiling water.
John read the book.
Ann turned on the lamp and the radio.
Ann read the book while listening to the radio.
Ann stood up to get some water.
Ann heard the phone ring.
Ann speaks on the phone.

John got out of the bathtub and dried his hair with the hair dryer.

John planned to surprise his son by painting a skateboard and football along with his son's name on the tree house.
John took a drink from his water bottle and admired his work.
John finished cleaning up all the paint supplies and wiped his forehead with a towel.
John watched as his son jumped up and down for joy after seeing his newly-painted tree house.
